header.author: T. Madden
header.title: A Letter from T. Madden, M. D. of Dublin, to Cromwell Mortimer, M. D. R. S. Secr. Giving an Account of Two Women Being Poisoned by the Simple Distilled Water of Laurel-Leaves, and of Several Experiments upon Dogs; By Which It Appears That This Laurel-Water is One of the Most Dangerous Poisons Hitherto Known
